definition: Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The industries in the province mainly spread over the Central Shaanxi Plain.
sentences.chinese: 陝西工業主要分佈在關中地區。

sentences.english: The winter wheat and the summer corn are the Guanzhong area most main grain crops.
sentences.chinese: 冬小麥和夏玉米是關中地區最主要的糧食作物。

definition: offspring a famous family (idiom); good breeding/blue blood
